Support.mvc

Interface IView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FaceBoard, InfoBoard, InfoPage, IntroPage, JFXPage, PlayBoard, PlayPage, SettingsPage, TPage, TView

    public interface IView
    Contains generalised methods of view layer of MVC design pattern.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addController(IController controller)
      Attaches a controller object to the view component.
      IController getController()
      Retrieves the reference of the previously added controller component.
      boolean isControllerAttached()
      Tells whether a controller component is attached.
      void modelPropertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Receives the property change event occurred in the model component.
      void removeController()
      Detaches the previously added controller component.

    • Method Detail

      • isControllerAttached

        boolean isControllerAttached()
        Tells whether a controller component is attached.
        Returns:
        True if controller component attached to the view component and false otherwise.

      • modelPropertyChange

        void modelPropertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
                  throws TError
        Receives the property change event occurred in the model component. The event is delegated by the controller component.
        Parameters:
        evt - Describes the details of property change occurred in the model component.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • addController

        void addController(IController controller)
            throws TError
        Attaches a controller object to the view component. Only one is available at same time.
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller object to attach.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • removeController

        void removeController()
        Detaches the previously added controller component.

      • getController

        IController getController()
        Retrieves the reference of the previously added controller component.
        Returns:
        Reference to the added controller component. Null if no component is added yet.
